title: Who to build the new items on?

replies.body: I have been building the Righteous Glory on Skarner and Sion a lot. Also tried it on Braum with Kallista as my ADC which made for some pretty potent initiations. As for Ohmwrecker I imagine it's going to be the ultimate siege item. Put it on someone like Mumu (who would also benefit from RG now that I think about it) who can quickly dive a tower and put pressure on the enemies. This way you can break sieges much easier.

> I have been building the Righteous Glory on Skarner and Sion a lot. Also tried it on Braum with Kallista as my ADC which made for some pretty potent initiations. As for Ohmwrecker I imagine it's going to be the ultimate siege item. Put it on someone like Mumu (who would also benefit from RG now that I think about it) who can quickly dive a tower and put pressure on the enemies. This way you can break sieges much easier.

Building it on Skarner jungle or?

Yeah Skarner jg. I don't play him in any other role. His early clear aint so great but if you take a second level in your W compared to maxing your Q you can generally get enough sustain from the Hunters Machete to back at around level four which is a guaranteed jg item with some boots and a pink ward. At least that's what I do. My only complaint is he is generally to low to gank early but the level 6 ganks are still brutal.{{champion:72}}  is love {{champion:72}} is life.

I've been playing Skarner jungle too. That's why I asked. I find his early clear pretty good. I can do blue, wolves, red and then go gank without going back.  What runes and masteries and jungle items you been using?
I have 1, 23, 6 for my masteries and my runes are as follows, 3 Armour Quints, 4 Marks of Health, 4 Marks of AD, 9 Armour Seals and 9 Glyphs of MR. Sorry for the delayed reply btw. Was on holidays.

Ah I see. I don't know if you need all that armour since they increased Skarner's starting armor by a lot. I take 3 X +1.5% movement speed Quints, 9 X +1.7% attack speed Marks,  9 X +1 armour Seals and 9 X +0.16 magic resist per level Glyphs. And 5/22/3 Masteries at the moment.
Probably not but I just have a set rune page that I use for all my tanks, so Braum and a few top laners as well. I may not need it but you can never have too much armour eh?

Righteous Glory is a really nice item. AD tank hybrids can go this route with early sustain from {{item:3010}} . 80% speed reduction is THE disengage in this game atm. Worked a treat as pantheon versus singed top.

I'm looking forward to trying Righteous Glory on Leona an awful lot. It seems like it should fit her style of initiation well. Honestly looks like it'd be amazing on all melee supports to me! 

For supports at least, I think that Tanky supports would generally rather get Locket. On the other side of things, I think Banner of Command could work well for when you would build Aegis on a non-tanky support to help the team, but getting the straight bonus defensive stats of Locket isn't as great.  That, or with a team that has no real tank, and wants to poke and push hard. 

Ohmwrecker, I'm really not sure! I could actually see this picked sometimes on tanky initiatior supports, especially with the LAZORZZ from the Inhibitor Turrets. With inhibitor turrets, it's worth pointing out that the Point Runner passive works really well against the slow, and the active prevents the damage reduction / armour piercing, which shoulds pretty great to me. I'm a little wary though, because I've always kinda liked Ohmwrecker on paper, but when I actually used it, didn't like it as much when playing support.
